meanings.definition: Not bulky; not taking up much space or being difficult to move
meanings.sent1: The small backpack was unbulky and easy to carry.
meanings.sent2: The unbulky suitcase fit perfectly in the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent3: The unbulky kitten squeezed into the tiny box for a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her unbulky laptop held all her important documents.
meanings.sent5: The unbulky umbrella folded neatly into her purse.

meanings.definition: Not large or cumbersome in size or shape
meanings.sent1: The unbulky chair fit nicely in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She preferred unbulky earrings that didn't weigh down her ears.
meanings.sent3: The unbulky car zipped through traffic with ease.
meanings.sent4: His unbulky wallet held just a few bills and cards.
meanings.sent5: The unbulky book was easy to read in one sitting.
